A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fine movie.  Seemingly a pastiche of corporate marketing research (and maybe one person's alien titty fetish?)\, it was fun enough.  Enjoyed Laura Dern having fun and looking stunning as always in here alien gown. Still do not understand how Adam Driver is a professional actor. A lot of the fighting was shot very sloppily but kudos to some badass saber tricks. The whole story was meaningless in the grand arc of the star wars mythos. Nothing changes! Whatever\, gimme more porgs.
